basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Daniel Yoon! Iâ€™m currently a Software Developer specializing in web applications. I build useful and visually appealing tools using modern Javascript libraries such as React. Previously, I used to work in roles involving logistics and retail. Working with clients and teams across different businesses has helped me gain a sense of the kind of needs and expectations that users have for different industries and platforms. I'm excited to work on projects that make a strong impact on the world. I'm also a collector of various things, with my most recent interest being headphones!

projects.title: MyHeadphones
projects.description: A website that hobbyists can use to curate and share their headphones collection. I developed this using pure vanilla Javascript and made use of localStorage to allow the creation of local user accounts and collections.

projects.title: JS Snake Game
projects.description: Personal project for practicing with Javascript. I implemented a LinkedList data structure to keep track of the snake and included a feature where the player can "shed" the tail and leave it behind.
